mainSequence.step: User requests the display of attributes
ViewAllClasses receives the request and calls getAttributes() on ModelClass
ModelClass returns an ArrayList of Attributes to ViewAllClasses
ViewAllClasses loops through each attribute to retrieve details
ViewAllClasses retrieves attribute properties and communicates with Attribute
Attribute returns attribute properties to ViewAllClasses
ViewAllClasses processes the attributes for display
ViewAllClasses renders the attributes in the UI
